name: Sanctified Icon
description: A golden icon depicting a saint.
message: You discover a Sanctified Icon. Faith +1.

choices.label: Pray before the icon
choices.message: You pray deeply. Faith +2.

choices.label: Contemplate in silence
choices.message: You feel a quiet peace. Faith +1.

choices.label: Ignore and move on
choices.message: You walk past, unmoved.

name: Altar
message: You kneel at the Altar. Faith +1. Peace fills your heart.

choices.label: Kneel and pray
choices.message: You kneel and pray. Faith +2.

choices.label: Leave an offering
choices.message: You leave a token. Faith +1.

choices.label: Walk away
choices.message: You leave the altar untouched.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: A restless spirit lingers among the ruins.
dialogue: The past is never truly gone...
Do you seek forgiveness, or do you bring regrets?

choices.label: Listen to its tale
choices.message: You listen quietly. Faith +1.

choices.label: Offer a prayer
choices.message: You pray for the spirit. Faith +2.

choices.label: Flee
choices.message: You hurry away, unsettled.

name: Hermit Mason
description: An old mason repairs the broken stones.
dialogue: Even ruins can be rebuilt, given time.

choices.label: Help with repairs
choices.message: You help the mason. Health +2.

choices.label: Ask for wisdom
choices.message: The mason shares a parable. Faith +1.

choices.label: Rest nearby
choices.message: You rest and recover. Health +1.

name: Ancient Hourglass
description: A cracked hourglass filled with silver sand.
message: You ponder the passage of time. Faith +1.

choices.label: Turn the hourglass
choices.message: You feel a sense of renewal. Faith +2.

choices.label: Meditate on impermanence
choices.message: You accept change. Health +1.

choices.label: Leave it untouched
choices.message: You leave the hourglass as it is.

name: Collapsed Ceiling
description: A pile of rubble from a recent collapse.
message: You are struck by falling debris. Health -2.

choices.label: Try to clear the rubble
choices.message: You strain yourself and get scratched. Health -1.

choices.label: Search for valuables
choices.message: You find a small relic. Faith +1.

choices.label: Avoid the area
choices.message: You carefully avoid the rubble.

name: Treacherous Thief
description: A thief lurks in the shadows, eyeing your belongings.
dialogue: Not all who wander here are lost... some are just looking for loot.
Careful, these ruins are full of surprises.

choices.label: Confront the thief
choices.message: You get into a scuffle. Health -2.

choices.label: Offer a trinket
choices.message: The thief spares you and leaves. Faith +1.

choices.label: Sneak away
choices.message: You slip away unnoticed.

name: Hidden Trap
description: A nearly invisible snare set among the stones.
message: You step into a trap! Health -1.

choices.label: Free yourself quickly
choices.message: You escape but get hurt. Health -1.

choices.label: Call for help
choices.message: A spirit aids you. Faith +1.

choices.label: Carefully untangle
choices.message: You free yourself without further harm.

name: Flooded Courtyard
description: A courtyard partially submerged; waterlogged stones form pools.
message: The wet stones sap your energy. Stamina -1.

choices.label: Wade carefully
choices.message: You pick your steps carefully; it tires you. Stamina -1.

choices.label: Search the edges
choices.message: You find something glinting at the edge.

name: Sunken Library
description: Shelves collapsed into shallow pools; water laps at faded pages.
message: You recover a damp but legible page.

name: Mossy Plaza
description: A broad plaza where moss fills the gaps between paving stones.
message: The soft moss cushions your steps.

name: Submerged Well
description: A well overflowing, its steps submerged and slick.
message: The cold damp drains your energy. Stamina -1.

choices.label: Peer into the well
choices.message: The water ripples but reveals nothing.

choices.label: Lower a rope
choices.message: You fish something metallic from the depths.
